articles.title: Stowaway found dead in landing gear of American Airlines flight in Charlotte - NPR
articles.description: Police say maintenance workers discovered the body Sunday morning after the plane landed from Europe.
articles.content: Police say they are investigating the death of a stowaway found Sunday morning inside the landing gear compartment of an American Airlines flight that had recently arrived in Charlotte, N.C., from Eu… [+1533 chars]

articles.title: American Fish Company closes indefinitely following mass shooting - WECT
articles.description: This announcement comes after Southport Police announced the arrest of Nigel Edge in connection with the deadly shooting.
articles.content:
SOUTHPORT, N.C. (WECT) - The bar at the center of a mass shooting in Southport is closing indefinitely, according to a Facebook post.
